mapper.select: select id, project_code, subject_catalog, dept_id, dept_name, user_id, user_name, remarks, form_data, create_time, update_time from inspection_project where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into inspection_project(project_code, subject_catalog, dept_id, dept_name, user_id, user_name, remarks, form_data, create_time, update_time) values (#{projectCode}, #{subjectCatalog}, #{deptId}, #{deptName}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{remarks}, #{formData}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into inspection_project(project_code, subject_catalog, dept_id, dept_name, user_id, user_name, remarks, form_data, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.projectCode}, #{entity.subjectCatalog}, #{entity.deptId}, #{entity.deptName}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.formData}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into inspection_project(project_code, subject_catalog, dept_id, dept_name, user_id, user_name, remarks, form_data, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.projectCode}, #{entity.subjectCatalog}, #{entity.deptId}, #{entity.deptName}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.formData}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update project_code = values(project_code), subject_catalog = values(subject_catalog), dept_id = values(dept_id), dept_name = values(dept_name), user_id = values(user_id), user_name = values(user_name), remarks = values(remarks), form_data = values(form_data), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update inspection_project
project_code = #{projectCode},
subject_catalog = #{subjectCatalog},
dept_id = #{deptId},
dept_name = #{deptName},
user_id = #{userId},
user_name = #{userName},
remarks = #{remarks},
form_data = #{formData},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
